DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find counsel program investigator develop help breast cancer survivor adopt healthy lifestyle .
DOC.brief_title: Promoting Healthier Lifestyle Among Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign one two group . One group breast cancer survivor receive general information adopt healthy lifestyle behavior . The group breast cancer survivor receive counsel increase level physical activity . Participants three consultation health counselor . The first two consultation take place in-person third consultation take place via telephone . Participants also ask complete questionnaire assess physical mental well-being , dietary habit , physical activity habit four time-points : in-person first study visit , via mail online survey 6 week later , in-person 12 week later , via mail online survey 24 week later . Additionally , first study visit 12 week later , level aerobic fitness test participant walk long hallway six minute .
DOC.criteria: â‰¥ 18 year age ; capable speak read English ; diagnose stage 0II breast cancer ; currently disease free ; treat surgically breast cancer ; complete chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy least three month two year prior ; physically able exercise measure Physical Activity Readiness QuestionnaireRevised ( Thomas , Reading , & Shephard , 1992 ) ; currently physically inactive measure Godin Leisure Time Exercise Questionnaire ( Godin & Shepard , 1985 ) ; contemplate increase physical activity measure Exercise Stages Change Short Form ( Marcus , Selby , Niaura , & Rossi , 1992 ) .
